üá®üá≥Vice FM Ma Zhaoxu: The so-called report on the origins of #COVID19 compiled by #US intelligence community is a mendacious report made up for political purposes. China has made strong representations with #US.
Read the Statement by Vice FM Ma Zhaoxuüëá
https://t.co/vRLLZG38y4 https://t.co/uYKAvzeueR

Ma stressed
1/4: origin-tracing is a matter of science and it should be & can only be left to scientists.
2/4: the future work of global origin-tracing should and must proceed from the WHO-China joint study report.

üá®üá≥ Vice FM Ma Zhaoxu chaired a briefing on #COVID19 origin-tracing for diplomatic envoys in China. Over 160 diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations attended. Ma reiterated China's position on global origin-tracing. https://t.co/r5hKmMPwWj

The global impact of the West's dismal record on Covid has been hugely greater than China's, so why the calls for an international investigation of China? There's a far better case for an international investigation into why the West failed so badly. https://t.co/X8zu4kuWUD
Third, the practice, mechanisms and approaches used in the first phase should be drawn on to conduct further studies in an orderly and smooth manner.
Second, the second phase should not repeat what has already been conducted during the first phase, especially where conclusive findings were already reached.

Four main points of the Chinese proposal on the second phase of origin study are as follows:
First, the second phase should be guided by the WHA resolution, rely mainly on scientists, and conduct evidence-based scientific research.  https://t.co/ZEwSXC3nTa

China hopes that the WHO will treat #COVID19 origin-tracing work as a scientific issue, get rid of political interference, and actively and prudently promote tracing work continuously in multiple countries and regions around the globe.
